short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Metrix light wallet and transaction signing client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Light wallet and transaction signing client for the native Metrix blockchain.

MetriMask is a light wallet and transaction signing client for decentralized apps (dapps) for the Metrix blockchain. 

- Send and receive MRX and other MRC20 Tokens.
- Sign transactions sent from decentralized apps
